casebody.data:
LINEBERGER
v.
NCDOC, et al. No. 141A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2008. Elizabeth F. Parsons, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Corrections, et al. James R. Glover, Chapel Hill, for appellee.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of October 2008 by Plaintiff to Strike Defendants Reply Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of December 2008."
